price: Lalle ne waɗanda suke ɓõyẽwar abin da Allah Ya saukar da ga hujjõji bayyanannu, da shiriya, daga bãyan Mun bayyana shi ga mutãne, a cikin Littãfi (Alƙur'ãni), waɗannan Allah Yana la'anar su, kuma mãsu la'ana suna la'anar su.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُمُونَ مَآ أَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا بَيَّنَّٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَيَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّٰعِنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yaktumūna mā anzalnā mina al-bayināti wal-hudā min baʿdi mā bayyannāhu lilnnāsi fī al-kitābi ulāika yalʿanuhumu al-lahu wayalʿanuhumu al-lāʿinūna
